metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7347 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description: A Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition exists in ZoneMinderthrough 1.32.3 as a session remains active for an authenticated user evenafter deletion from the users table. This allows a nonexistent user toaccess and modify records (add/delete Monitors, Users, etc.).

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
